Name: Garden Madness
About the game: You play as a Farmer who is tired of the damned moles that come out of their holes and steal your carrots. It's time to get even with them and hit them over the head with your hammer! Garden Madness - A game in the style of 'Hit the Mole', by pressing certain buttons at a certain moment, we beat the moles emerging from their holes to dynamic music, collecting points and bonuses for successful hits in a row. Game Features: - Difficulty -Pixel Art - Music
